title: Council Decision of 24 March 2014 appointing and replacing members of the Governing Board of the European Centre for the Development of Vocational Training
header:
2.4.2014 EN Official Journal of the European Union C 97/7
COUNCIL DECISION
of 24 March 2014
appointing and replacing members of the Governing Board of the European Centre for the Development of Vocational Training
2014/C 97/02
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to Council Regulation (EEC) No 337/75 of 10 February 1975 establishing the European Centre for the Development of Vocational Training (1), and in particular Article 4 thereof,
Having regard to the nomination submitted by the United Kingdom government,
Whereas:
(1) By its Decision of 16 July 2012 (2), the Council appointed the members of the Governing Board of the European Centre for the Development of Vocational Training for the period from 18 September 2012 to 17 September 2015.
(2) A member’s seat is available for the United Kingdom on the Governing Board of the Centre in the category of Government representatives as a result of the resignation of Ms Marilyn EAST.
(3) The members of the Governing Board of the aforementioned Centre should be appointed for the remainder of the current term of office, which expires on 17 September 2015,
main_body:
The following persons are hereby appointed as members of the Governing Board of the European Centre for the Development of Vocational Training for the remainder of the term of office, which runs until 17 September 2015:
GOVERNMENT REPRESENTATIVES:
UNITED KINGDOM Mr Ian PEGG
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 March 2014.
For the Council
The President
A. TSAFTARIS
(1)  OJ L 39, 13.2.1975, p. 1. Regulation as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 2051/2004 (OJ L 355, 1.12.2004, p. 1).
(2)  OJ C 228, 31.7.2012, p. 3.
